00219 /*
00220  * Ensure that the SRM API is only included once.
00221  */

00224

00226 #define EXPORT_DLL
00227 #elif !defined(EXPORT_DLL)
00228 #if defined(_LIB)
00229 #define EXPORT_DLL
00230 #elif defined(_USRDLL)
00231 #define EXPORT_DLL __declspec(dllexport)
00232 #else
00233 #define EXPORT_DLL __declspec(dllimport)
00234 #endif
00235 #endif /* _WIN32 && EXPORT_DLL */
